description: Read information about the filesystem of the current machine (devices and partitions)

name: fs-filesystem

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test:ci && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run lint && nyc npm run unit && nyc report --reporter=lcov
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint && nyc npm run unit && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.test:no-cov: npm run lint && npm run unit
